Reviews.Title: “Good experience, met our expecations”
Reviews.Author: Jamie R
Reviews.Content: hotel located near busy trains station walking distance sites 35 star hotel nice experience staff helpful breakfast nice adequate overall satisfied

Reviews.Title: “Very impressive service at an excellent price”
Reviews.Author: G_M_T_43
Reviews.Content: son returned days break rome stayed hotel amadeus offering deal arrived reception staff friendly allowed check little earlier advertised time booked offer double twin hotel staff separated beds twin condition hotel excellent appeared recently refurbished immaculately clean looked stated hotel staff pleasant helpful encountered world thanks located 150m romes main termini railway station extremely convenient transport metro buses hoponhopoff bus tours express airport etc definitely using hotel future highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, clean and excellent location”
Reviews.Author: leicestermancunian
Reviews.Content: couple minutes termini doddle staff helpful pleasant lot traffic noise breakfasts basic wouldnt expect european cities lots english speaking guests nice facility english speaking news channel tv

Reviews.Title: “very rough, arrogant and and never guest friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: romeCochin
Reviews.Content: attitude staff disappointing rough arrogant director talking staying free please note paying 145 euros night evening till morning sits reception dont english treats guests key write claim 3 star worth experience bad spoiled trip mood entirely

HotelInfo.Name: Amadeus Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Gioberti, 39, 00185 Rome, Italy
